basic.description: This course covers the basics of the probability theory, random elements, and stochastic processes; characteristic functions and probability inequalities; central limit theorems; elements of Markov dependence and Martingale theory; common scholastic processes arising in biostatistics; advanced treatment of sufficient statistics; exponential families, estimation, and testing; as well as elements of asymptotic theory of statistical inference.
basic.subject: STA
basic.title: Advanced Probability and Inference I
